casebody.data:
MYER
v.
LEASE. No. 410P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. David L. Ray, Wilmington, for Mark Lease, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of August 2005 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
